dialog.title: Wedge
dialog.dialogTxt: There's the city

dialog.title: Biggs
dialog.dialogTxt: Hard to believe an Esper's been found intact there, 1000 years after the War of the Magi...

dialog.title: Biggs
dialog.dialogTxt: Bah! Probably just another wild goose chase...

dialog.title: Wedge
dialog.dialogTxt: I don't know...

dialog.title: Wedge
dialog.dialogTxt: They wouldn't have let us use her unless they were confident that the intel was good.

dialog.title: Biggs
dialog.dialogTxt: Ah yes... our witch.

dialog.title: Biggs
dialog.dialogTxt: I hear she fried fifty of our Magitek Armored Soldiers in under three minutes... Kinda makes your skin crawl, don't it?

dialog.title: Wedge
dialog.dialogTxt: Relax. With that thing on her head, she's a mindless puppet.

dialog.title: Wedge
dialog.dialogTxt: The girl won't even breathe unless we tell her to.

dialog.title: Wedge
dialog.dialogTxt: We'll approach from the east. Move out!

dialog.title: Wedge
dialog.dialogTxt: The girl takes point. And don't waste time on the riffraff! Remember what we're here for. Let's move!

dialog.title: Guard
dialog.dialogTxt: The Empire's got no buisness here!

dialog.title: Guard
dialog.dialogTxt: Imperial Magitek Armor! Not even Narshe's safe anymore!

dialog.title: Guard
dialog.dialogTxt: Stop them! For Narshe!

dialog.title: Guard
dialog.dialogTxt: We got'em trapped now!

dialog.title: Guard
dialog.dialogTxt: Defend the mines!

dialog.title: Wedge
dialog.dialogTxt: According to our source, some miners unearthed the frozen Esper in a new shaft they were digging...

dialog.title: Wedge
dialog.dialogTxt: This must be it.
A strange light fills the air.
Do you want to learn about save points?
At save points, you can use tents and sleeping bags, and also save the game.
You can also use the sae and quick save functions anywhere on the overworld map.

dialog.title: Biggs
dialog.dialogTxt: I'll handle this. Stand back!

dialog.title: Guard
dialog.dialogTxt: We're not handing over that esper!

dialog.title: Guard
dialog.dialogTxt: Ymir! Get them!

dialog.title: Biggs
dialog.dialogTxt: Hold it!

dialog.title: Biggs
dialog.dialogTxt:
Hold it!
That thing's a...! They must have trained it to guard the mines!

dialog.title: Wedge
dialog.dialogTxt: What are you talking about?

dialog.title: Wedge
dialog.dialogTxt:
What are you talking about?
You know what this is?

dialog.title: Biggs
dialog.dialogTxt: Ever heard of a lightning whelk?

dialog.title: Biggs
dialog.dialogTxt:
Ever heard of a lightning whelk?
It's a monster that absorbs lightning...

dialog.title: Wedge
dialog.dialogTxt: ...and stores the energy in its shell.

dialog.title: Biggs
dialog.dialogTxt:
Right.
So whatever you do, don't attack the shell!

dialog.title: Wedge
dialog.dialogTxt: Got it!
So...this is the frozen esper?

dialog.title: Wedge
dialog.dialogTxt: This thing's giving me the creeps...

dialog.title: Wedge
dialog.dialogTxt:
This thing's giving me the creeps...
Something's not right...
The frozen creature begins emitting an eerie light...

dialog.title: Wedge
dialog.dialogTxt: Wh-where's that light coming from!?

dialog.title: Wedge
dialog.dialogTxt:
Wh-where's that light coming from!?
Whaaagh!

dialog.title: Biggs
dialog.dialogTxt: Wh-what was that!? ...Wedge?

dialog.title: Biggs
dialog.dialogTxt:
Wh-what was that!? ...Wedge?
Wedge, where are you? H-hey! What's going on!?

dialog.title: Girl
dialog.dialogTxt: Where...am I?

dialog.title: Old Man
dialog.dialogTxt: My, my! And I only just removed the crown!

dialog.title: Girl
dialog.dialogTxt: My head...hurts...

dialog.title: Old Man
dialog.dialogTxt: Easy there! This is a slave crown. The others were using it to control you.

dialog.title: Old Man
dialog.dialogTxt: It was robbing you of your thoughts-making it so you'd do whatever they told you.

dialog.title: Girl
dialog.dialogTxt: I can't remember a thing...

dialog.title: Old Man
dialog.dialogTxt: Don't worry, it'll all come back to you... In time, that is.

dialog.title: Girl
dialog.dialogTxt: My name is...{Terra_Name}...

dialog.title: Old Man
dialog.dialogTxt: Impressive! I've never heard of anyone recovering this fast. You must be made of tougher stuff than most...

dialog.title: Guard
dialog.dialogTxt: Open up!

dialog.title: Guard
dialog.dialogTxt: We are here for the Magitek armor pilot!

dialog.title: Guard
dialog.dialogTxt: Open this door right now!

dialog.title: Guard
dialog.dialogTxt: Hand over that girl!

dialog.title: Guard
dialog.dialogTxt: She is an agent of the Empire!

dialog.title: {Terra_Name}
dialog.dialogTxt: ...Empire? ...Magitek armor?

dialog.title: Old Man
dialog.dialogTxt: There's no time to explain! You need to get out of here! These fools aren't going to listen to reason...

dialog.title: Old Man
dialog.dialogTxt: Make your way out of town through the mines! I'll try to buy you some time.

dialog.title: Guard
dialog.dialogTxt: Up there!
